_description: Gospel for Ascension Sunday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: To his desciples carpe cristAls witnes Iohn þe euangelist…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Als in a tale we may here tellOf a king how it bifell
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum uenerit paraclitus & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica infra octava ascencionis Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 94ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.219-220 .
